title: Insights into the pH effect on hydrogen electrocatalysis
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00370E, Review Article
Wen-Gang Cui, Fan Gao, Guoquan Na, Xingqiang Wang, Zhenglong Li, Yaxiong Yang, Zhiqiang Niu, Yongquan Qu, Dingsheng Wang, Hongge Pan
This review systematically provides various insights into the pH effect on hydrogen electrocatalysis, and thus providing a reference for future development of hydrogen electrocatalysis based on these insights.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
